name: Saturday Knight Fever
description:
You're the Disco Knight, sneaking into a VIP party at Club 25.

You just must take selfies of all the amazing statues at the venue on your way.

Try to sneak around the bouncers.

Camera flash can stun them.

Controls;

- Move by pressing the touchpad.

- Pull the selfie rapier from your waist with the trigger.

- Press the touchpad while holding it to take a photo - it takes a few seconds to be ready again.

- Use grip to toggle between forward and selfie cam.

Screen goes black at the end - see your party dance on your monitor. (we ran out of time to do this in vr)
